about_the_game:
Are you ready for an exciting adventure step by step in “Poor Thief”?

In this addictive game called “Poor Thief,” you’ll have the chance to become the most skilled thief in the world of theft!
You’ve been tasked with stealing a legendary diamond collection in the underworld. However, as you steal each diamond, the number of police chasing you will increase. The more diamonds you steal, the more points you’ll earn, but at the same time, the risk of getting caught by the police will also increase.
The game offers a combination of skill and strategy.
But be careful, because the police will be watching you at all times! Opportunity to explore new locations and missions with constantly updated content.
Are you ready? Embark on a smuggling adventure in dangerous streets and experience a thrilling adventure with “Poor Thief”!
